DefaultEvent.Description:
They walk a little straighter, when they return. They creak a little less. "Living cake!" exclaims one cheerfully. "My head is swimming with vigour and joy. I must consume more live food. Do you know, I can almost see why cannibalism."

"So where are we going next?"
DefaultEvent.Name: The well-fed dead

ChildBranches.Name: Arrange a fine meal at a restaurant ashore
ChildBranches.Description: The dead are always hungry. Stuff their mouths with bolete-cake, and they'll stay out of trouble.

DefaultEvent.Description: "Don't I look darling? It is a little bit like being tied up with serpents. But one gets used to it. Mm. One really gets used to it. And now where are we going?"
DefaultEvent.Name: The gladdest of rags

RareDefaultEvent.Description:
"We've made friends! Here's my big friend! And here's my little friend. Yes, I've been drinking. You'd have been drinking too. Where have you brought us? It's like Hell, but noisier. Here. Here, you look after my friends. I had to swap someone. Never mind. We won't miss him."

"So where are we going next?"
RareDefaultEvent.Name: Voices raised in song

ChildBranches.Name: Let them go off and purchase new bandages
ChildBranches.Description: $Polythreme -> ポリズリーム, Venderbight -> ヴェンダーバイト$Every stain tells a story, or so the Venderbight fashion has it. But some of these stories are getting a little tired; and the living bandages of Polythreme will make fine souvenirs.

DefaultEvent.Description:
"Yesss. Yesss, We can be one of your dead men. No. No, we require no food. A payment? For our trouble? How delightful. We'll sstay out of the way..."

"Tell uss. Where are we going? Will there be... people? We feel sso empty."
DefaultEvent.Name: A furtive conversation

RareDefaultEvent.Description:
"Yesss. Yesss, We can be one of your dead men. No. No, we require no food. A payment? For our trouble? How delightful. We'll sstay out of the way...."

"Tell uss. Where are we going? Will there be... people? We feel sso empty."
RareDefaultEvent.Name: A furtive conversation

ChildBranches.Name: Recruit a Bandage-Colony
ChildBranches.Description: $Polythreme -> ポリズリーム$Clothes-colonies - living assemblages of garments - walk Polythreme, upright as any citizen of London. The more raggedy ones could pass for tomb-colonists...[If you're missing a tomb-colonist, this may be useful.]

Description: $Venderbight -> ヴェンダーバイト$"...this is the city where the stones of the streets cry out. Excellent. If I wanted silence, I would have stayed in Venderbight, where even the bats hesitate to squeak. I look forward to a number of considerable headaches."
Name: $Polythreme -> ポリズリーム$Tomb-Colonists in Polythreme
